Central African bloc lifts Gabon sanctionsThe Economic Community of Central African States agreed to lift sanctions on Gabon on Saturday and reintegrate it into the regional bloc, six months after suspending its membership in response to a coup that ousted President Ali Bongo. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 12:36:16 GMT UM4Y7RDGFRIJLJSLQ5YVTQX3TU https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/central-african-bloc-lifts-gabon-sanctions-2024-03-10/Reuters世界非洲
US military airlifts embassy personnel from Haiti, bolsters securityThe U.S. military said on Sunday it has carried out an operation in Haiti to airlift non-essential embassy personnel from the country and added U.S. forces bolster embassy security, as Caribbean nation reels under a state of emergency. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 12:13:32 GMT CO27EBV7TZO5XF7MMZ6ANY7SKU https://www.reuters.com/world/us-military-airlifts-embassy-personnel-haiti-bolsters-security-2024-03-10/Reuters世界
Israel's Herzog opens Holocaust museum in Amsterdam amid protestIsraeli President Isaac Herzog is attending the opening of the National Holocaust Museum in Amsterdam on Sunday amid pro-Palestinian protests demanding an immediate ceasefire in the Israel-Hamas conflict in Gaza. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 12:12:33 GMT 7A45YTD2YNNIZAR5IDY5HSZEM4 https://www.reuters.com/world/israels-herzog-opens-holocaust-museum-amsterdam-amid-protest-2024-03-10/ Charlotte Van Campenhout, Piroscka Van De Wouw, Hilder Verweij世界
Senegal opposition coalition promises new currency and revamp of oil contractsA Senegalese opposition coalition backed by popular firebrand Ousmane Sonko launched its presidential campaign platform on Saturday with promises to create a new national currency and renegotiate mining and energy contracts. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 11:54:44 GMT 3HMHDBCLXBOC5DPQMRDKEIX6QU https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/senegal-opposition-coalition-promises-new-currency-revamp-oil-contracts-2024-03-10/Reuters世界非洲
Swiss police search for six missing skiers near MatterhornPolice in Switzerland's Valais canton on Sunday were searching for six people who went missing during a ski tour that departed from the Alpine town of Zermatt. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 11:48:05 GMT T2OW7OSGKZMF5CRBPP2MPK3H7A https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/swiss-police-search-six-missing-skiers-near-matterhorn-2024-03-10/Reuters世界欧洲
Palestinians prepare for Ramadan in the shadow of Gaza warHopes for a ceasefire, which would have allowed Ramadan to pass peacefully and enabled the return of at least some of the 134 Israeli hostages held in Gaza, appear to have been disappointed, with talks in Cairo apparently stalled. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 11:30:48 GMT R2BNHETO4JJOPBDV2FN5KBNUJI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/palestinians-prepare-ramadan-shadow-gaza-war-2024-03-10/Sinan Abu Mayzar, Bassam Masoud世界中东
Kate, UK's Princess of Wales, issues first message since undergoing surgeryKate, Britain's Princess of Wales, thanked the public on Sunday for their support in her first public message since undergoing abdominal surgery in January, posting a picture of herself with her three children. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 09:43:00 GMT CPE2BXJOLJJHHLHNSXSKUOZ3D4 https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/kate-uks-princess-wales-issues-first-message-since-undergoing-surgery-2024-03-10/Reuters世界英国
Iraq hopes to lure Christian pilgrims with new church in ancient UrThe bell of a new church built near Iraq's ancient city of Ur chimed for the first time last week as part of a push to lure back pilgrims to a country that is home to one of the world's oldest Christian communities. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 07:07:42 GMT EIAU5YZBJNMEXJ62AGVAAG7ZEI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iraq-hopes-lure-christian-pilgrims-with-new-church-ancient-ur-2024-03-10/Reuters世界中东
Indonesia floods, landslide kill 19, with seven missingDays of torrential rain have brought floods and landslides in Indonesia's province of West Sumatra, forcing the evacuation of more than 70,000 people, while killing at least 19, with seven going missing, authorities said on Sunday. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 06:20:44 GMT Y7M65ROBMVOKZLIEXL22IEJIN4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesia-floods-landslide-kill-19-with-seven-missing-2024-03-10/Reuters商业环境
Woman dies in Ukraine's shelling of Russia's Kursk, governor saysA woman died as a result of Ukraine's shelling of the village of Kulbaki in Kursk and her husband was seriously injured, the governor of the Russian region bordering Ukraine said on Sunday. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 05:19:34 GMT B3SKUCJVBJIIVBSARQPAU2WOFQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/woman-dies-ukraines-shelling-Russias-kursk-governor-says-2024-03-10/Reuters世界欧洲
Israel's Herzog to open Holocaust museum in Amsterdam amid protestIsraeli President Isaac Herzog is to attend the opening of the National Holocaust Museum in Amsterdam on Sunday amid a planned protest against Israel's killing of tens of thousands of Palestinians in Gaza. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 05:05:45 GMT ND5KHNGAEFJC7N7T3N4YIO4BJA https://www.reuters.com/world/israels-herzog-open-holocaust-museum-amsterdam-amid-protest-2024-03-10/Charlotte Van Campenhout世界
